document.heading: Israel Senior Residences Tax Exemption Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-285, the “Israel Senior Residences Tax Exemption Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-800. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 4, 2012 and Dec. 18, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Jan. 29, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-652 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-285 became effective on April 27, 2013.
